1.comment: Kerry Rhodes. Delhomme didn't even look like he was trying on this 1. 4. The 4.h and final interception was 1 of the worst throws I've ever seen from any quarterback on any level. Delhomme appeared as though he was looking into the stands when he fired this pass downfield. Perhaps he saw his son in the crowd. At this point, forum member PantherFaninfl commented, I wish Carolina would get a quarterback, Ill take Tebow, Pike, Snead, the homeless dude I saw in Orlando, anyone over Delhomme.
